name: Emoji Hop 2016—A New Emoticons Dotz Jump & Dodge Skyward Game
name_original: Emoji Hop 2016—A New Emoticons Dotz Jump & Dodge Skyward Game
description:
Difficult and addictive!! Once you start, you can't stop!

- Dash the emoji face as high as you can;
- Be careful of the danger blocks, don't let it close on you;
- Beat your friends score!

How high can you Dash?
